value.name: Richard Moulton jailed for 20 years for knife attack
value.description: A MAN who went on stabbing rampage armed with two knifes in the centre of Wigton has been jailed for 20 years. Richard John Moulton, 50, appeared via video link at Durham Crown Court today to be ...

value.name: Hager, Nora Hixson
value.description: Survivors include her son, Joe (Jan) Hager; daughters, Wanda (John) Vittiglio and Brenda (Richard) Moulton; nine grandchildren; 15 great-grandchildren; three cousins; and several nieces and nephews.
